resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82271</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82271</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4528</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Al Cinema</string>
            <string language="es">Al Cine</string>
            <string language="ga">Al Cinema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Al-Kino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cinéma d'Al</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cinema Do Al</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cinematografo Di Al</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινηματογράφος Al</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet with keywords and a short form to fill out once a favourite film has been selected. Excellent for developing oral discussion skills in the area of cinema.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo con palabras clave y un breve formulario para rellenar una vez que se haya seleccionado una película favorita. Excelente para desarrollar habilidades de exposición oral en el área del cine.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre le heochairfhocail agus foirm ghearr le líonadh nuair a roghnaítear scannán is fearr leis an dalta. Iontach le haghaidh scileann díóspóireachta i réimse na scannán a fhorbairt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Italian</string>
            <string language="es">Italiano. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Iodáilis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen mit Schlüsselwörtern und einem kurzen 
Formular, zum heraus zu füllen, sobald ein Liebling Film ausgewählt 
worden ist. Ausgezeichnet für das Entwickeln der Munddiskussion
Fähigkeiten im Bereich des Kinos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau avec des mots-clés et une forme courte à 
compléter une fois qu'un film de favori a été choisi. 
Excellent pour développer des qualifications orales de 
discussion dans la zone du cinéma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha com keywords e um formulário curto a 
encher-se para fora uma vez que uma película do favorito foi 
selecionada. Excelente para desenvolver habilidades orais da 
discussão na área de cinema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro con le parole chiavi e un 
questionario ridotto da compilare una volta che una pellicola del 
favorito è stata selezionata. Eccellente per sviluppare le 
abilità orali di discussione nella zona del cinematografo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας με τις λέξεις κλειδιά και μια σύντομη 
μορφή που συμπληρώνει μόλις επιλεχτεί μια αγαπημένη ταινία. 
Αριστος για την ανάπτυξη των προφορικών δεξιοτήτων 
συζήτησης στον τομέα του κινηματογράφου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Italienisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Italien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιταλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>

            <entry>4528</entry>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
